venue.name: Beehive

item.description:
I've heard great things about the Beehive in the South End! It's a little bit of a hike from the Back Bay station just take Clarendon down to Tremont and take a left. For better directions and more info check out their website http://www.beehivebos....

Hope to see you there!

Encourage you to pay as you order or maintain your own tab

Here's some more info on the Beehive:

The Beehive
Categories: Jazz & Blues, Restaurants [Edit]

Neighborhood: South End
541 Tremont St
(between Hanson St & Milford St)
Boston, MA 02116
(617) 423-0069
www.beehiveboston.com
